description: From substitutional generation of Kolakoski sequence (A000002).
links: David Spies, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..69
David Spies, Rust program for generating terms
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Kolakoski sequence.
formula: Generate A000002 via 2 -> 22 -> 2211 -> 221121 -> 221121221 -> ...; sequence gives lengths of successive strings.a(n) appears to be asymptotic to c*(3/2)^n where c=1.3094.. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Dec 18 2002
author: _David W. Wilson_
